indicator_name: Montant total des financements pour les pays en développement aux fins de la promotion de la mise au point, du transfert et de la diffusion de technologies respectueuses de l’environnement
SDG_GOAL: Goal 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
SDG_TARGET: Target 17.7: Promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies to developing countries on favourable terms, including on concessional and preferential terms, as mutually agreed
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 17.7.1: Total amount of funding for developing countries to promote the development, transfer, dissemination and diffusion of environmentally sound technologies
